snippet: Programming will soon begin at 8 p.m. to meet advertisers’ demands for more airtime on the cable network, which leads in the ratings for some coveted categories.
abstract: Cable network Adult Swim is ranked number one in late night television with viewers 18 to 49; programming will soon begin at 8 pm to meet advertisers’ demands for more airtime.
lead_paragraph: Programming will soon begin at 8 p.m. to meet advertisers’ demands for more airtime on the cable network, which leads in the ratings for some coveted categories.

headline.main: Adult Swim, No. 1 With Younger Adults, Is Expanding
headline.print_headline: Adult Swim, No. 1 With Younger Adults, Is Expanding
